entry.title: Tuesday night: Flurries. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy late this evening with flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas before morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind southwest 20 km/h becoming light this evening. Wind becoming north 30 gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 15 overnight. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: A few flurries. High minus 2.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending in the morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 2. Wind chill minus 18 in the morning and minus 9 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NDT Tuesday 4 April 2023
